desc:
Simple bodyweight exercise primarily working your pectoralis muscle.
Also works: Shoulders and Triceps.

Barbell exercise in which lifter lays down and presses weight vertically, primarily working the pectoralis muscle.
 Also works: Shoulders and Triceps.

Machine assisted or freeweight exercise primarily focusing on your pectoralis muscle.
Also works: Shoulders and Triceps.

Simple dumbbell exercise where weight is curled upward with fist in a hammer-like position.
Works the bicep.

Dumbbell or barbell exercise where lifter rests arms on inclined surface and curls weight toward them.
Works the bicep.

Simple dumbbell exercise where lifter lays on inclined surface, holds weight to the side, and curls upward.
Works the bicep.

Simple dumbbell exercise where lifter stands straight or sits on flat surface with weight above their head, extending their arm to a straight vertical position.
May also work core if standing.
Machine assisted exercise where lifter extends arm downward, simultaneously lifting specified weight upward.

Bodyweight exercise where lifter holds themself up with their arms on a elevated flat surface, moving vertically downward then upward.
Also works: Shoulders and chest.
Bodyweight exercise where lifter lays on flat surface and moves legs in a similar motion to that of riding a bicycle.
Bodyweight exercise where lifter holds themself up on flat surface making a plank like structure with their body. Motion is held for as long as possible.
Bodyweight exercise where lifter lays down and brings their knees toward their face, emphasizing the use of abdominal muscles.

Barbell exercise where lifter holds barbell in front of their head and performs a squat.
Also works: hamstring and glutes.

Difficult exercise where lifter places one leg on elevated surface and performs a squat with the other.
Additional weight is encouraged, which can be added by holding dumbbells at side of body.
Also works: hamstrings and glutes.

Machine assisted exercise where lifter presses specified weight on an upward incline using their legs only.
Also works: hamstrings and glutes.
Difficult bodyweight exercise where lifter holds their bodyweight up by a bar and pulls themself up repeatedly. Primarily works lats and biceps.

Barbell exercise where lifter holds weight while facing downward and pulls it up toward their stomach.
Primarily works lats and biceps.

Difficult barbell exercise where lifter picks up heavy weight from a low position and stands straight up with it.
Works: back, traps, core, glutes, and hamstrings.
Barbell or dumbbell exercise where lifter holds weight near head and presses upward. Also works: chest, lats, and triceps.
Barbell exercise where lifter performs a simple benchpress on a bench that is inclined. Also works: chest and triceps.
Dumbbell exercise in which lifter holds weight to their sides, pulling weight upward until dumbbells are aligned with shoulders.
Barbell or dumbbell exercise where lifter picks weight off the ground keeping relatively straight legs.

Barbell exercise where lifter holds weight on their back behind their head and performs a squat.
Also works: glutes and hamstrings.
Simple machine assisted exercise where lifter lays on stomach and brings heels to glutes, simultaneously lifting specified weight.
Not available.
